alert.note: Alert for Eastland (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 26 at 4:27PM CDT until April 26 at 5:00PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 500 PM CDT FOR EAST CENTRAL EASTLAND COUNTY... At 426 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Gorman, or 12 miles southeast of Eastland, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Tennis ball size hail and 65 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of east central Eastland County, including the following locations... Desdemona, Staff and Kokomo. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...65 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for central and north central Texas. This storm is producing large hail. SEEK SHELTER NOW inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows. This storm is producing destructive winds and large damaging hail. SEEK SHELTER NOW inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
